pycopancore.model_components.environmental_awareness.interface module¶

model component Interface template.

class pycopancore.model_components.environmental_awareness.interface.Culture[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for Culture process taxon mixin.

awareness_lower_carbon_density = variable 'awareness lower carbon density' (characteristic value of terrestrial carbon density below which individuals get more likely to become environmentally aware), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e3 tC m^-2], >=0, default=1e-05¶
awareness_update_fraction = variable 'awareness update fraction' (fraction of individuals updating their awarenesssimultaneously), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], >=0, <=1, default=0.1¶
awareness_update_rate = variable 'awareness update rate' (rate at which a fraction of individuals update their awareness), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[a^-1], >=0, default=1¶
awareness_upper_carbon_density = variable 'awareness upper carbon density' (characteristic value of terrestrial carbon density above which individuals get more likely to become environmentally unaware), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e3 tC m^-2], >=0, default=2e-05¶
max_protected_terrestrial_carbon_share = variable 'maximal protected share of terrestrial carbon' (what share of the current terrestrial carbon would be treated as protected if population is environmentally friendly), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], >=0, <=1, default=0.5¶
class pycopancore.model_components.environmental_awareness.interface.Individual[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for Individual entity type mixin.

is_environmentally_friendly = variable 'is environmentally friendly' (whether the entity is environmentally friendly or not), not None, scale=ordinal, levels=[False, True], default=False¶

description = 'Declining/growing terrestrial carbon increases likelihoodof individuals becoming environmentally friendly/careless'¶

some longer description

a unique name for the model component

class pycopancore.model_components.environmental_awareness.interface.SocialSystem[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for Individual entity type mixin.

max_protected_terrestrial_carbon = variable 'maximal protected stock of terrestrial carbon' (what stock of the current terrestrial carbon would be treated as protected if population is environmentally friendly), not None, scale=ratio, unit=gigatonnes carbon [GtC], >=0, default=0¶
protected_terrestrial_carbon = variable 'protected stock of terrestrial carbon' (what stock of the current terrestrial carbon will be treated as protected and thus not harvested at each point in time), not None, scale=ratio, unit=gigatonnes carbon [GtC], >=0, default=0¶
protected_terrestrial_carbon_share = variable 'protected share of terrestrial carbon' (what share of the current terrestrial carbon will be treated as protected and thus not harvested at each point in time), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], >=0, <=1, default=0¶
